Articles.Content:
Hello people of the forums,

I have been running a very NASA like save (MLSA:P) for awhile and decided to show you guys my missions. I'll start with the launchers and then move into the missions later.
[FONT=arial black][SIZE=4]Kerbal Launch System MK1
[FONT=arial][SIZE=2]The original workhorse of the program, since retired and put on display
[/SIZE][/FONT][/SIZE][/FONT][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tQOCXM5.png[/IMG]

[FONT=arial black][SIZE=5]KLS MK1B
[FONT=arial][SIZE=2]The short upgrade to the KLS MK1, this version has an advanced upper stage
[/SIZE][/FONT][/SIZE][/FONT][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/a1HUKGO.png[/IMG][FONT=arial black][SIZE=5]
[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=arial black][SIZE=5]KLS MK2
[FONT=arial][SIZE=2]A much more permanent upgrade to the KLS family, this version takes the KLS Mk1B upper stage and adds a single core instead of 9. This allows the addition of boosters later on and more reliable and bigger engines
[/SIZE][/FONT][/SIZE][/FONT][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/sX8Zvgg.png[/IMG][FONT=arial black][SIZE=5]
[/SIZE][/FONT]

I will add to this later
